segments.text: Tom has grown six inches within a year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He has reached puberty . His mind and body both will change a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , do you see his Adam's apple ? It becomes bigger .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Time is flying . I still remember everything when he was a child .
segments.speaker: S2
